StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetComponentChangeRequestData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@NwaId int)
AS
SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(p.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(p.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS Name ,cc.COMPONENT_CODE AS ComponentCode ,cc.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION AS ComponentDescrip.on ,c.CONTRACT_ID AS ContractId FROM [dbo].[NWA] n WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[CONTRACT] c ON c.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] p ON p.PERSON_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[COMPONENT_CODE] cc ON cc.COMPONENT_CODE = c.COMPONENT_CODE WHERE n.NWA_ID = @NwaId
